email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the high 40s? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $49.75 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised quote. The rate is more in line with our expectations. However, could we push the laycan to 18-22 October? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s availability for these dates? Regards, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve checked with the owner, and the MV Ocean Star is available for the revised laycan of 18-22 October. Everything else remains the same: $49.75 per metric ton and $25,000 per day for demurrage. Let me know if we can proceed. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that works for us. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star at $49.75 per metric ton and the agreed demurrage rate. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Recap: Crude Oil Shipment - MV Ocean Star
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, here’s the recap: Vessel: MV Ocean Star, DWT: 150,000, LOA: 280m. Cargo: Crude Oil, 140,000 MT. Load Port: Houston, Discharge Port: Rotterdam. Laycan: 18-22 October. Freight Rate: $49.75 per metric ton. Demurrage: $25,000 per day, pro rata. Please confirm if everything is in order. Best regards, Sarah.
